QuestionArr.question: The correct way to declare a variable x of float data type in python is
QuestionArr.correct_msg:
We just write the variable name and can assign any type of value and then the type of variable will change according to the value we assign in it. So, x = 2.5 is correct.
x = float(2.5) is also another correct way to define it.
QuestionArr.incorrect_msg:
We just write the variable name and can assign any type of value and then the type of variable will change according to the value we assign in it. So, x = 2.5 is correct.
x = float(2.5) is also another correct way to define it.
